TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_caduk, title = caduk, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/caduk} }

S.FORM: caduk 鏟子 siwkay nu balat u malukay a sakaluk, taneng mibelih miala ku lala'. matinpi ku tangah, sisakapetay a culay. tinaku a kamu caduken 去鏟 caduken kiya lala' milacul i kazizeng. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika A shovel is a tool for digging, lifting, and moving bulk materials, such as soil, coal, gravel, snow, sand, or ore. Most shovels are hand tools consisting of a broad blade fixed to a medium-length handle. Shovel blades are usually made of sheet steel or hard plastics and are very strong. Shovel handles are usually made of wood or glass-reinforced plastic (fibreglass).

cadok 鏟子 siwkay no balat o malokay a sakalok, taneng mibelih miala ko lala'. matinpi ko tangah, sisakapetay a colay. tinako a kamo cadoken 去鏟 cadoken kiya lala' milacol i kazizeng. o solit no Holam ato Amilika A shovel is a tool for digging, lifting, and moving bolk materials, soch as soil, coal, gravel, snow, sand, or ore. Most shovels are hand tools consisting of a broad blade fixed to a mediom-length handle. Shovel blades are osoally made of sheet steel or hard plastics and are very strong. Shovel handles are osoally made of wood or glass-reinforced plastic (fibreglass).
